property.name: user_add
property.value: insert into user_add values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE addCount=?

property.name: user_visit
property.value: insert into user_visit values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE visitcount=?,visitAllCount=?

property.name: flow_pv
property.value: insert into mobile_phonepv values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count=?
